nodes.text: Dav Pold was a male Human who served as a lieutenant in the Republic Army. During the Galactic War, he was stationed at the Galactic Republic's Aurek Base on the planet Hoth, sharing his expertise with other soldiers.
Lieutenant Dav Pold appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a class trainer for the Trooper class on Hoth.
